overview: Harajuku Lovers Live captures Gwen Stefani's high-energy crowd-pleasing first solo headlining tour, which brought her music to life in an elaborately staged live show. Filmed in Gwen's hometown of Anaheim, CA and featuring her huge hits from her debut album (Love. Angel. Music. Baby.) and a peek into her second album, The Sweet Escape.
title: Gwen Stefani: Harajuku Lovers Live
